text: daryl_dixon Do n't look . Do n't look .
rick_grimes Shh shh shh . Wait wait wait wait .
beth_greene Ma . -Come on ! Pull her away , pull her away !
shane_walsh We 've been out . We 've been combing these woods looking for her and she was in there all along ? You knew ?
maggie_greene Leave us alone .
rick_grimes Hey , Shane , just stop , man .
shane_walsh Get your hands off me .
hershel_greene I-- .
shane_walsh You knew and you kept it from us .
hershel_greene I did n't know .
shane_walsh That 's bullshit . I think y' all knew .
maggie_greene We did n't know !
shane_walsh Why was she there ? !
hershel_greene Your -- Otis put those people in the barn . Maybe he found her and put her in there before he was killed .
shane_walsh You expect me to believe that ? Do I look like an idiot ?
rick_grimes Shane , hey hey hey .
hershel_greene I do n't care what you believe !
rick_grimes Everybody just calm down .
hershel_greene Get him off my land !
rick_grimes Please . No .
shane_walsh Let me tell you something .
maggie_greene Hey . Do n't touch him ! Have n't you done enough ?
hershel_greene I mean it -- off my land .
rick_grimes What are you doing ? Hey , what are you doing ?
shane_walsh daryl almost died looking for her , Rick . Any one of us could have . I 'm gon na tell you right now -- that son of a bitch , he knew .
rick_grimes He did n't know . He 's not like that . He opened his home to us .
shane_walsh Put us all in danger . Man , he kept a barn full of walkers .
rick_grimes So you just start an insurrection , hand out guns and massacre his family ?
shane_walsh His family 's dead , rick .
rick_grimes Well , he does n't believe that . He thinks you just murdered them in cold blood .
shane_walsh No , man , I do n't care what he thinks .
rick_grimes I was handling it , brother . I was handling it and you just-- .

shane_walsh You had us out in those woods looking for a little girl that every single one of us knew was dead ! That 's what you did . Rick , you 're just as delusional as that guy . You handling it , huh ?
glenn_rhee I have to ask you -- did you know she was in the barn ? You know , maybe in some way this is for the best . At least we know and now we can move on .
maggie_greene Move on ?
glenn_rhee Yeah , it 's just like it meant so much to everyone -- finding her , you know ? And then-- .
maggie_greene So now you 'll just move on ?
glenn_rhee If we can . I mean , we 've lost others . This is -- this is Sophia . The whole group -- this one was different .
maggie_greene So what happens now ?
glenn_rhee We bury her with your stepmom and your stepbrother .
maggie_greene And then ?
glenn_rhee I do n't know .
carl_grimes I thought I 'd find her .
lori_grimes We all did .

carl_grimes I mean me -- that I 'd be the one . Like maybe she was hiding somewhere in a cave or a tree . She 'd be safe and I 'd find her and bring her back . He did the right thing , shooting her like that . I would 've done it too .
lori_grimes Dale ?
dale_horvath Yeah ?
lori_grimes Could you take carl up to the house ? I want you to rest .
carl_grimes Okay .
rick_grimes Hey , you dropped that .
theodore_douglas You want us to start burying ?
andrea_harrison We need a service . carol would want that .
theodore_douglas Yeah , we all want that .
lori_grimes Let's -- let 's dig a grave for Sophia , Annette and Shawn . Over by those trees . And we 'll need a truck to move the bodies .
jimmy I 'll get the keys .
shane_walsh No no . I got the truck .
jimmy And the others ? That 's a lot of digging .
andrea_harrison We bury the ones we love and burn the rest .
lori_grimes Get to work .
lori_grimes What did hershel say ?
rick_grimes He wants us off the farm , or shane at least .
lori_grimes That 's not a surprise . We 're lucky someone was n't killed . And all that gunfire -- more walkers could 've heard it . Baby , what is it ?
rick_grimes She was there all the time .
lori_grimes And you did everything you could .
rick_grimes Yeah , I know . I always do , do n't I ? Went after her , protected her , killed those walkers , but she still got bit . And carl still got shot .
lori_grimes Mm - hmm .
rick_grimes People counting on me and I had 'em chasing a ghost in a forest .
lori_grimes Hey .

shane_walsh Do you got something to say , Dale ? Well , go ahead , man . Mr. Moral authority , huh ? The -- the voice of reason . Let me ask you something , man . What do you do ? What do you do to keep this camp safe , huh ? What do you do ? What , you fix up an RV ? You babysit some guns ? Man , you pointed one at my chest , right ? But you just -- you could n't pull that trigger , could you ? If I was such a danger , if I was such a threat , what did you do to stop me , huh ? I smashed that barn open . I saved Carl . That 's me . That ai n't you . That ai n't Rick . That 's me . Tell you what , Dale -- next time I need a radiator hose . I 'll give you a call , man .
theodore_douglas That 's it .
lori_grimes They 're ready . Come on .
carol_peletier Why ?
daryl_dixon 'Cause that 's your little girl .

carol_peletier That 's not my little girl . That 's some other thing . My Sophia was alone in the woods . All this time I thought . she did n't cry herself to sleep . She did n't go hungry . She did n't try to find her way back . Sophia died a long time ago .
rick_grimes A few more trips .
andrea_harrison We got lucky . If that barn had any more , we could 've been overrun .
theodore_douglas Good thing shane did what he did when he did .
dale_horvath You ca n't tell me this was right .
rick_grimes It was n't . It 'll cost us with hershel .
andrea_harrison He 's grieving . He 'll come around , see we had no choice . Look , I shot too . This was n't all shane .
theodore_douglas Look , I got no qualms about it . Walkers in my backyard ? Hm - mmm .
dale_horvath I 'm not saying that we should n't have taken care of the problem , but creating a panic ? !
lori_grimes There 's no point arguing about it . It 's done . There 's nothing we can do about it .
theodore_douglas Better get moving .
andrea_harrison Hey ! Hey ! All right !
maggie_greene So if your group leaves , you would n't stay ?
glenn_rhee I -- I had n't really thought about it . I mean , I -- I did n't know that -- do -- do you think this is really the time . to discuss this , I mean ?
maggie_greene Well , I 'm not really feeling like there 's a lot of time for anything .
glenn_rhee No no , there -- there is . There is . I mean , I - I -- I want-- .
maggie_greene Oh my god .
maggie_greene Sweetie , can you hear me ? What 's wrong with her ?
lori_grimes She might be in shock . Where 's Hershel ?
glenn_rhee We ca n't find him anywhere .
maggie_greene Hey , kiddo .
rick_grimes Your stepmother 's things ?
maggie_greene He was so sure she 'd recover . They 'd just pick up where they left off .
shane_walsh Looks like he found an old friend .
maggie_greene That belonged to my grandfather , gave it to dad when he died .
rick_grimes I did n't take hershel for a drinker .
maggie_greene No , he gave it up on the day I was born . He did n't even allow liquor in the house .
rick_grimes What 's the barn in town ?
maggie_greene Hatlin 's . He practically lived there in his drinking days .
rick_grimes Betting that 's where I 'll find him .
glenn_rhee Yeah , I 've seen the place . I 'll take you .
rick_grimes All right , I 'll get the truck .
glenn_rhee Okay .
maggie_greene N -- no .
glenn_rhee It 's an easy run .
maggie_greene Like the pharmacy ?
rick_grimes Hey , Maggie ? I 'll bring him back .
glenn_rhee Maggie , that was different .
lori_grimes Rick ? You want to have a conversation about this before you leave ?
shane_walsh So you 're seriously gon na go after this guy with everything that 's going on , huh ? What you gon na do ?
lori_grimes He 's right . This is not the time to head off , not today . You do n't know what 's have-- .
rick_grimes I 'm not arguing . It 's the least I can do for hershel after we-- .
shane_walsh What ? After we what ?

lori_grimes carl said he would 've shot Sophia himself . That 's your son . He 's getting cold . He 's growing up in a world with -- he 's growing up in a world where he needs a father like you -- around , alive , not running off , solving everybody else 's problems .
rick_grimes It 's not just his problem I 'm trying to solve . We need hershel for the baby . I 'm going after him .
rick_grimes You ready ?
glenn_rhee Yeah .
shane_walsh Hey . Carol ? Carol . Hey hey hey hey hey . Hey , are you all right ?
shane_walsh Come here .
shane_walsh I want you to know that I 'm real sorry for your girl .
carol_peletier Thank you .
shane_walsh When I opened that barn I had no idea . If I did .
shane_walsh Everybody thinks that I 'm a. I was just trying to keep everybody safe . I had no idea she was in there .
dale_horvath This place is going to hell .
lori_grimes Yeah , I 'm trying hard to prevent that .
dale_horvath You wo n't be able to . No , there are people in this group who think that what shane did was justified .
lori_grimes I know you two ca n't stand each other , but he did something that needed to be done .
dale_horvath He 's dangerous .
lori_grimes Yeah , he 's a hothead .
dale_horvath No , Lori , he 's dangerous . I think he killed Otis .
lori_grimes Otis was killed by walkers .
dale_horvath He knew how to handle walkers . Otis was the one who was putting them in the barn .
lori_grimes You need to be really clear with me right now . What are you saying ?
dale_horvath I believe that -- that shane sacrificed Otis . I ca n't prove it , but I - I - I -- I think that he -- I think that he shot him and left him for bait , so that he could get away .
lori_grimes shane may be a hothead , but he 's not a murderer . And -- and why would he kill somebody who 's trying to help ?
rick_grimes We 've said enough .

dale_horvath I do n't know . Maybe he was pinned down . He said -- he said it . He all but threw it in my face . I 'm telling you -- I knew guys like him , and sooner or later he 's gon na kill somebody else .
glenn_rhee maggie said she loves me .
rick_grimes Mm - hmm .
glenn_rhee She does n't mean it . I mean she ca n't . I mean -- well . she -- she 's upset or confused . She 's probably feeling , like-- .
rick_grimes I think she 's smart enough to know what she 's feeling .
glenn_rhee No . No .
glenn_rhee No , you know what ? She wants to be in love , so she's -- she needs -- something to -- to , like -- to hold onto .
rick_grimes Glenn , it 's pretty obvious to everyone maggie loves you , and not just because you 're one of the last men standing . So what 's the problem ?
glenn_rhee I did n't say it back .
rick_grimes Huh .

glenn_rhee I 've never had a woman say that to me before except my mom , of course , and my sisters . But with Maggie , it 's different . We barely know each other . What -- what does she really know about me ? Nothing . We 're practically strangers . But I -- I did n't know what to do with it . I just stood there like a jerk .
rick_grimes Hey . Hey , this is a good thing , something we do n't get enough of these days . Enjoy it . And when we get back , return the favor . It 's not like she 's going anywhere .
glenn_rhee Rick ? I know about Lori , her being pregnant . I got her those pills .
rick_grimes I figured .
glenn_rhee Hey , I 'm sorry I kept it from you .
rick_grimes Do n't be . You did what you thought was right . It just so happens it was n't .
andrea_harrison Her heart 's racing . She 's burning up . We need Hershel . He 'll know what to do .
lori_grimes Would you look in on carl for me ?
andrea_harrison Of course .
lori_grimes Moving to the suburbs ? Listen , Beth 's in some kind of catatonic shock . We need hershel .
daryl_dixon Yeah . So what ?
lori_grimes So I need you to run into town real quick and bring him and rick back . Daryl ?
daryl_dixon Your bitch went window - shopping . You want him ? Fetch him yourself . I got better things to do .
lori_grimes What 's the matter with you ? Do n't you be so selfish .

daryl_dixon Selfish ? Listen to me , Olive Oil . I was out there looking for that little girl every single day . I took a bullet and an arrow in the process . Do n't you tell me about me getting my hands dirty ! You want those two idiots ? Have a nice ride . I 'm done looking for people .
rick_grimes hershel .
hershel_greene Who 's with you ?
rick_grimes glenn .
hershel_greene maggie sent him ?
rick_grimes He volunteered . He 's good like that . How many have you had ?
hershel_greene Not enough .
rick_grimes Let 's finish this up back at home . beth collapsed , is in some sort of state . Must be in shock . I think you are too .
hershel_greene Maggie 's with her ?
rick_grimes Yeah , but beth needs you .
hershel_greene What could I do ? She needs her mother . Or rather to mourn like she should 've done weeks ago . I robbed her of that . I see that now .
rick_grimes You thought there was a cure . Ca n't blame yourself for holding out for hope .
hershel_greene Hope ? When I first saw you running across my field with your boy in your arms , I had little hope he would survive .
rick_grimes But he did .

hershel_greene He did . Even though we lost Otis . Your man shane made it back and we saved your boy . That was the miracle that proved to me miracles do exist . Only it was a sham , a bait and switch . I was a fool , Rick , and you people saw that . My daughters deserve better than that .
glenn_rhee So what do we do ? Just wait for him to pass out ?
hershel_greene Just go . Just go !
rick_grimes I promised maggie I 'd bring you home safe .
hershel_greene Like you promised that little girl ?
rick_grimes So what 's your plan ? Finish that bottle ? Drink yourself to death and leave your girls alone ?
hershel_greene Stop telling me how to care for my family , my farm . You people are like a plague ! I do the christian thing , give you shelter , and you destroy it all !
rick_grimes The world was already in bad shape when we met .
hershel_greene And you take no responsibility ! You 're supposed to be their leader !
rick_grimes Well , I 'm here now , are n't I ?
hershel_greene Yes . Yes . Yes , you are .
rick_grimes Now come on . Your girls need you now more than ever .
dave Well , hang on a second . This farm -- it sounds pretty sweet . Do n't it sound sweet , Tony ?
tony Yeah , real sweet .

dave How about a little southern hospitality ? We got some buddies back at camp , been having a real hard time . I do n't see why you ca n't make room for a few more . We can pool our resources , our manpower .
rick_grimes Look , I 'm sorry . That 's not an option .

hershel_greene I did n't want to believe you . You told me there was no cure , that these people were dead , not sick . I chose not to believe that . But when shane shot Lou in the chest and she just kept coming , that 's when I knew what an ass I 'd been , that Annette had been dead long ago and I was feeding a rotten corpse ! That 's when I knew there was no hope . And when that little girl came out of the barn , the look on your face -- I knew you knew it too . Right ? There is no hope . And you know it now , like I do . Do n't you ? There is no hope for any of us .
shane_walsh You ready ?
theodore_douglas Yeah . Man , how many times we gon na have to do this ?

rick_grimes Look , I 'm done . I 'm not doing this anymore , cleaning up after you . You know what the truth is ? Nothing has changed . Death is death . It 's always been there , whether it 's from a heart attack , cancer , or a walker . What 's the difference ? You did n't think it was hopeless before , did you ? Now there are people back at home trying to hang on . They need us , even if it 's just to give them a reason to go on , even if we do n't believe it ourselves . You know what ? This -- this is n't about what we believe anymore . It 's about them .
dave Son of a bitch . They 're alive . I 'm Dave . That scrawny - looking douche bag there is tony .
tony Eat me , dave .
dave Hey , maybe someday I will . We met on I-95 coming out of Philly . Damn shit - show that was .
glenn_rhee I 'm Glenn . It 's nice to meet some new people .
rick_grimes rick Grimes .
dave How about you , pal ? Have one ?
hershel_greene I just quit .
dave You 've got a unique sense of timing , my friend .
rick_grimes His name 's Hershel . He lost people today , a lot of them .
dave I 'm truly sorry to hear that . To better days and new friends . And to our dead -- may they be in a better place . Ah . Ah . Not bad , huh ? I got it off a cop .
rick_grimes I 'm a cop .
dave This one was already dead .
rick_grimes You fellas are a long way from Philadelphia .
dave It feels like we 're a long way from anywhere .
rick_grimes Well , what drove you south ?
dave Well , I can tell you it was n't the weather . I must 've dropped 30 LBS . In sweat alone down here .
tony I wish .

dave No , first it was DC I heard there might be some kind of refugee camp , but the roads were so jammed , we never even got close . We decided to get off the highways , into the sticks , keep hauling ass . Every group we came across had a new rumor about a way out of this thing .
tony One guy told us there was the coast guard sitting in the gulf , sending ferries to the islands .
dave The latest was a rail yard in Montgomery running trains to the middle of the country -- Kansas , Nebraska .
glenn_rhee Nebraska ?
tony Low population , lots of guns .
glenn_rhee Kinda makes sense .
dave Ever been to Nebraska , kid ? A reason they call 'em flyover states .
dave How about you guys ?
rick_grimes Fort Benning , eventually .
dave I hate to piss in your cornflakes , officer , but . we ran across a grunt who was stationed at Benning . He said the place was overrun by lamebrains .
glenn_rhee Wait , Fort Benning is gone ? Are you for real ?

dave Sadly , I am . Oddly , the truth is there is no way out of this mess . Just keep going from one pipe dream to the next , praying one of these mindless freaks does n't grab ahold of you when you sleep .
tony If you sleep .
dave Yeah , it does n't look like you guys are hanging your hats here . You holed up somewhere else ?
rick_grimes Not really .
dave Those your cars out front ?
glenn_rhee Yeah . Why ?
dave We 're living in ours . Those look kinda empty , clean . Where 's all your gear ?
hershel_greene We 're with a larger group out scouting , thought we could use a drink .
dave A drink ? Hershel , I thought you quit . Well , we 're thinking of setting up around here . Is it -- is it safe ?
glenn_rhee It can be , although I have killed a couple of walkers around here .
dave Walkers ? That what you call them ?
glenn_rhee Yeah .
dave That 's good . I like that . I like that better than lamebrains .
tony More succinct .
dave Okay , tony went to collage .
tony Two years .
dave So what -- so what , you guys set up on the outskirts or something ? That new development ?
tony Trailer park or something ? A farm ?
dave Old McDonald had a farm .
dave You got a farm ?
tony E - I - E - I - O. Is it safe ?
dave It 's got ta be . You got food , water ?
tony You got cooze ? Ai n't had a piece of ass in weeks .
dave Listen , pardon my friend . City kids -- they got no tact . No disrespect . So listen , Glenn-- .
dave Does n't sound like it 'd be a problem .
hershel_greene I 'm sorry . We ca n't .
rick_grimes We ca n't take in any more .
dave You guys are something else . I thought -- I thought we were friends . We got people we got ta look out for too .
rick_grimes We do n't know anything about you .

dave No , that 's true . You do n't know anything about us . You do n't know what we 've had to go through out there , the things we 've had to do . I bet you 've had to do some of those same things yourself . Am I right ? 'Cause ai n't nobody 's hands clean in what 's left of this world . We 're all the same . So come on , let's -- let 's take a nice friendly hayride to this farm and we 'll get to know each other .
rick_grimes That 's not gon na happen .
dave Rick-- .
tony This is bullshit .
rick_grimes Calm down .
tony Do n't tell me to calm down . Do n't ever tell me to calm down .
glenn_rhee Whoa .
tony I 'll shoot you three asshole in the head and take your damn farm !

dave Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa . Relax . Take it easy . Nobody 's killing anybody . Nobody 's shooting anybody . Right , Rick ? Look . We 're just friends having a drink . That 's all . Now where 's the good stuff , huh ? Good stuff , good stuff , good stuff . Let 's see . Hey . look at that . That 'll work .
dave You got ta understand -- we ca n't stay out there . You know what it 's like .
rick_grimes Yeah , I do . But the farm is too crowed as is . I 'm sorry . You 'll have to keep looking .
dave Keep looking . Where do you suggest we do that ?
rick_grimes I do n't know . I hear Nebraska 's nice .
dave Nebraska . This guy lighter flicks ] ' Oh I see that lantern ' ' Trimmed low ' ' Burning in our home ' ' And though I feel like crying ' ' I swear tonight ' ' I 'll cry no more '
